name: Bark & Clean Dog Wipes for Paws and Butt, 50 Count Large 8.5" x 9" Hypoallergenic Bamboo Pet Wipes Compostable Puppy Wipes with Lavender for Dogs Body Face - Deodorizing Grooming Wipes
short_description: Bark & Clean's dog wipes for paws and butts are the perfect solution for a quick clean in between baths or to take off dirt and grime after a walk or hike.
These lavender dog wipes are infused with soothing and moisturizing ingredients like lavender, shea butter, vitamin E, coconut oil, and aloe making them perfect for dogs with sensitive skin.
Our puppy wipes are compostable, hypoallergenic, alcohol-free, and paraben-free.
This package of dog wet wipes comes with 50 8.5" x 9" bamboo pet wipes. Each pack has a resealable, pop-up lid to prevent the wipes from drying out.
Our dog face wipes come in packs of 50 and 110 as well as a travel option with indivually-wrapped wipes.

name: 400 Unscented Pet Wipes for Paws and Butt Plant Based Hypoallergenic Pets Cleansing & Deodorizing Anal Gland Hygienic Puppy Wipes for Dogs Face and Body Cat Wipes Cleaning Fur Doggie Wipes Doggy Wipes
short_description: Unscented: Free from fragrances, alcohol, and parabens; hypoallergenic and eco-friendly.
Plant-based Deodorizing Ingredient: Zinc Diricinoleate effectively removes odors from pets (dogs, cats, and other animals) including anal gland and fur odors.
Pet-Safe Formula: Uses Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract as a moisturizer.
Made from Plant Fibers: Sourced from sustainable wood resources.
Large Size: Each wipe measures 8"×8" (can be folded in half for wiping your pet's bottom). When pulling out a wipe, gently lift a single sheet to avoid pulling out multiple wipes and prevent waste.
Impressive Cleaning Power: Plant fibers, with better absorbency than polyester, are softer and effectively remove dirt from your dog's dirty paws, ears, fur, face, and eyes (cats too).
The safety lid on the packaging helps to keep the wipes fresh and moist. Remember to close the lid after each use.
If you are not satisfied with purchasing our dog wipes cleaning deodorizing, please feel free to contact us, and we will provide you with the best solution.
Our wipes are not extra-thick, so we recommend folding them when cleaning your pet's bottom.
Compostable wipes: Our planet-friendly, plastic-free pet cleansing wipes help you live a more eco-conscious life.

short_description: PET GROOMING WIPES - Our grooming body wipes are veterinarian formulated and groomer recommended for routine cleaning of dogs & cats. Free of parabens, harsh chemicals, and alcohol, these hypoallergenic pet wipes are safe for dogs and cats.

ULTRA SOFT DOG WIPES - These super soft hypoallergenic wipes, made with the Furbliss formula, which includes key ingredients like Vitamin E, Aloe & Deoplex - a natural enzymatic deodorizer to eliminate pet odor.
DURABLE DOG & CAT WIPES - Thick, soft & gentle premium cloth wet wipes are better than using baby wipes, they're designed with dogs & cats in mind. A great addition to your pet grooming supplies.

PET WIPES FORMULA -Furbliss wipes are made with the Furbliss formula for multi-purpose use all over the body including paws, face, ears, belly & rear end. Use daily for better hygiene and to keep your pet smelling their best!

VET FOUNDED, VET FORMULATED, VET RECOMMENDED - Vetnique products like Furbliss are made in the USA with globally sourced ingredients, are vet recommended and vet formulated. Check out the Vetnique store page for more great pet essentials.

Happy, Healthy Fur: Hypoallergenic formula cleanses, shines, and deodorizes your pet's coat without harsh chemicals or unnecessary ingredients. Simply the essentials for a fresh, happy pet.
Pure & Safe Formula: Alcohol-free, paraben-free, and unscented to minimize irritation and allergic reactions. Prioritizes your pet's well-being, just like you do.

name: Burt's Bees for Pets Gentle Cleansing Puppy Wipes with Buttermilk, 98% Natural Origin Formulas, Hypoallergenic Dog Wipes Cleaning, Dog Cleaning Wipes, Dog Wipes for Paws and Butt, 50ct
short_description: DOG SKIN VS. HUMAN SKIN - Dogs' skin has a higher pH, so human skincare products can be harmful. These dog wipes keep their coat clean and without irritation, making it an essential part of your puppy bathing supplies.
DOG SPOT CLEANING WIPES- These dog wipes with naturally derived honey help cleanse between baths - a must-have in your puppy bathing supplies.
NATURALLY DERIVED INGREDIENTS– Safe & gentle dog wipes with 98%+ natural origin formulas, formulated without chemical detergents, phthalates, parabens, or sulfates, as well as colorants and dyes.
MADE IN THE USA - These deodorizing dog wipes are made in the USA.
SKIN-SOOTHING HONEY - Burt’s Bees for Pets products use honey to naturally condition your dog's coat, nourish skin, and maintain the perfect pH balance for pets
GRAPEFRUIT FRAGRANCE - This light citrusy fragrance cuts through odors and refreshes your pup.
NO. 1 NATIONAL BRAND IN PET GROOMING - Join the millions of pet parents worldwide that trust Burt's Bees as the number 1 national brand in pet grooming shampoos & conditioners*
product_description: Since 1984, Burt’s Bees has been working with nature to create products that nourish your skin. With the same mission in mind, we created a custom formulated range of puppy grooming products to bring the same quality to the lives of our pets. Burt’s Bees™ for Pets™ Puppy Wipes are perfect for spot cleaning the skin and coat, reducing odors and unwanted smells. Leveraging the power of naturally derived ingredients, buttermilk gently cleanses puppies' fur and coat while honey acts as a conditioner and regulates the delicate pH unique to pets, delivering a high shine finish. All our dog grooming products utilize a minimum 95%+ natural origin formulas and are formulated without chemical detergents, phthalates, parabens, or sulfates. Our dog wipes are also formulated without added colorants and dyes. Burt’s Bees naturally derived pet grooming solutions keep pets clean and pet parents happy! Our hypoallergenic dog wipes are cruelty-free and made in the USA with global ingredients. We choose to formulate without harsh chemicals, while ensuring 95%+ natural origin formulas, pH balanced to effectively cleanse and nourish your pet. Directions: Wipe dog from back of head to tail, carefully avoiding the eyes. *Nielsen Total Pet Plus Stores Pet Grooming Shampoo/Conditioner L52 W/E 10-11-25

name: Petkin Pet Wipes for Dogs and Cats, Oatmeal, 100 Wipes (Large) for Dogs and Cats - Soothes Itchy Dry Skin and Cleans Ears, Face, Butt, Body and Eye Area - Idea for Home and Travel
short_description: Petkin Pet Wipes For Dogs and Cats - These large grooming wipes are a fast, convenient way to freshen up your pet every day. They easily remove daily dirt and odor with a quick wipe down, alongside soothing dry, itchy skin. Includes 1 pack of 100 wipes.

Extra Gentle For Your Furry Friend - These soothing dog wipes are extra gentle and ideal for daily use around your pet's eyes, ears, face, body and butt. Won't remove spot flea treatments. Perfect puppy wipes and kitten wipes. Lightly scented, vanilla and oatmeal.

Use Less Wipes - The 7 x 11 inch Big 'n Thick wipes are larger than standard wipes, making them the smart choice for large pets and helps reduce how many wipes you need to use. Moistened with a gentle cleaning formula, and enriched with a soothing organic oat extract and skin-soothing aloe to keep your pet's fur soft, shiny and smelling great.

Super Convenient, Goodbye Shampoo - Petkins are perfect for quick touch ups between baths. Use as dog paw wipes after a muddy walk, or when it's too cold for outside bathing. A great solution for older pets that are difficult to bathe.
Easy To Use - Open the lid and remove seal. Pull a wet dog wipe out. Close lid tightly. Gently wipe entire pet until clean. No water or rinsing is required. Use daily or as needed.

name: Lick-Safe Daily Pet Wipes for Dogs & Cats - Vet-Approved & Hypoallergenic - Cleans Mud, Odor & Dander - Wipes for Paws, Face & Butt - 10% to Charity - Earth-Friendly & Unscented Cleaning - Pack of 100
short_description: VET-APPROVED & LICK-SAFE FOR DAILY USE - Wipe without worry - our formula is vet-approved and safe if your dog or cat licks their fur after use. Perfect for DAILY cleanups after every walk, before bed, or anytime they need a refresh. Safe for paws, face, and butt.

SAFE FOR DOGS & CATS – FROM NOSE TO TAIL - Use as pet paw wipes, dog face wipes, or even cat butt wipes - safe for full-body use on all breeds, sizes, and life stages. Whether after walks, litter box mishaps, or grooming routines, one wipe does it all whether you wipes cats or dogs.

HYPOALLERGENIC & GENTLE ON SENSITIVE PET SKIN - Made with all-natural soothing Aloe, Oatmeal, Shea Butter & Cucumber. These unscented puppy wipes and cat cleaning wipes are free from harsh chemicals, alcohol, parabens, and artificial fragrances - gentle enough for sensitive skin.

CLEANS MUD, ODORS & DANDER FAST - Our textured 8x8 wipes remove dirt instantly. Perfect for DAILY paw cleaning after walks, face freshening, and body wipes between baths. Use 2-5 wipes daily to remove outdoor dirt and allergens from your pet and home.

REDUCE WASTE WITH EARTH-FRIENDLY WIPES & PACKAGING - Made from wood-based VEOCEL fibers (no plastic or microfibers) and packaged in 77% recycled plastic. Our dog wet wipes and cat wipes for cleaning fur help keep your pets and the planet happy.

ETHICAL PET CARE THAT GOES BEYOND THE WIPE - Certified cruelty-free with the PETA bunny logo - no animal testing, ever. And when you buy our pet wipes for cats and dogs, 10% of our profits support the Soi Dog Foundation and help rescue stray animals around the world.

SMALL BUSINESS WITH A MISSION TO RESCUE 100,000 ANIMALS - Founded by husband-and-wife team Curtis and Katie, G.A.S is more than a brand - it’s a purpose. We’re here to change the pet care industry with heart, honesty, and impact.
